about_the_game: The Iron Oath Original Game Soundtrack, composed by Alex Roe, contains 50 tracks written for the 1.0 release of The Iron Oath. Journey from Westmire to the Redlands with orchestral music showing the vast world of Caelum, filled with epic battle themes and songs that depict each country and its cities. This is no ordinary medieval fantasy soundtrack, the world of The Iron Oath is a land of song, rich in melody and waiting to be discovered!
detailed_description: The Iron Oath Original Game Soundtrack, composed by Alex Roe, contains 50 tracks written for the 1.0 release of The Iron Oath. Journey from Westmire to the Redlands with orchestral music showing the vast world of Caelum, filled with epic battle themes and songs that depict each country and its cities. This is no ordinary medieval fantasy soundtrack, the world of The Iron Oath is a land of song, rich in melody and waiting to be discovered!
legal_notice:
The Iron Oath soundtrack is composed and produced by Alex Roe.
© 2022, Alex Roe. All rights reserved.
name: The Iron Oath Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 317 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1260 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: High Quality is WAV
